column1: Uchi////You can never go wrong with happy hour here. The scene is lively with great hour prices
column4: save yourself the pain of waiting
column5: make a reservation! With that aside
column6: the sushi and sashimi dishes here are Bomb as well as many other dishes! If unsure what to eat
column7: go for the omakase (chef's tasting menu) or ask your server for recommendations.
